summary: Arriving home to find his native land under the yoke of corrupt merchants, an adventurer named Sadko sets sail in search of a mythical bird of happiness.
cast: Sergey Stolyarov|Alla Larionova|Ninel Myshkova|B. Surovtsev|Mikhail Troyanovskiy|Nadir Malishevsky|Nikolay Kryuchkov|Ivan Pereverzev|Yuri Leonidov|Lev Fenin|Mikhail Astangov|Lidiya Vertinskaya|Stepan Kayukov|Olga Viklandt|Sergey Martinson|Nikolai Khryashchikov
keywords: character name as title|one word title|mythology|psychotronic film|russia
title: Sadko
